description: Open House of 7 Meadow Lane,  Charmaine McNally’s  home and garden. Charmaine was one the self-build leaders in this 14 home women-led community self-build scheme.  Meadow Lane was originally the third of  Fusion Jameen’s schemes. Tim Oshodi was engaged as self-build consultant, with project management and cost control provided by Survey Design Partnership and Martin Hughes, the contracts manager.

events.name: Drop in
events.notes: Drop in through out the afternoon

factsheet.heading: Women Lead Self Build
paragraphs: Charmaine engagingly shares her personal journey, transforming her life from being a single parent with three kids in a two-bedroom tower block flat to creating her dream six-bedroom home with a garden leading down to the naturalized River Quaggy. She will recount her inspiring story of starting with little DIY experience, gaining training, learning how to hang doors, and eventually running her own construction business after completing the scheme. Hear how her confidence grew as she negotiated the installation of solar panels and the inter generational impact of the self-build, with her son later building his own home, inspired by the leadership roles Charmaine embraced.
